title: Authors and Citation
text: Stabile B (2022). NUPcollection: R package NUP Collection. R package version 0.0.0.9000.
code: @Manual{,   title = {NUPcollection: R package for NUP Collection},   author = {Bruno Stabile},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

title: R package for NUP Collection
text: can install development version NUPcollection GitHub :

title: Abbreviate species — abbr_species
text: data Species dataset species_var Species variable name

title: Format table — format_table
text: data Species dataset species_var species variable name. Defaults "especie" sep Separator measures. Defaults " - "

title: Hello, World! — hello
code: hello() #> Error in hello(): could not find function "hello"

title: Species compare — species_compare
text: data Species dataset species_target target species compare species_var species variable name. Defaults "especie" measure_var measure variable name. Defaults "medidas"
